Contact
.entry-header
Contact
Naples Society Wine Bar strives to create a warm, welcoming community for all wine lovers.  Please contact us with general inquiries, questions or concerns. We’d love to hear from you!
You can call us, email us, find us on
Facebook
,
Instagram
or stop by for a conversation over a glass of wine or a flight!
239-234-5113
winelovers@napleswinebar.com
Sign Up for our Newsletter

About Us
.entry-header
About Society Wine Bar
The Ultimate Destination for Wine Lovers
Naples Society Wine Bar offers 200 wines available by the glass or bottle, craft beers, ciders, and meads, and a selection of small plates. Our menu offers a vast variety of styles, varietals, and price points to please any palate. With a focus on education, our certified staff is always happy to teach guests about what is in every glass. The weekly Wine Society educational tastings provide even more knowledge in a fun and casual atmosphere. With so many options, you could try something new and learn something different on every visit.
Naples Society Wine Bar also offers retail sales if you are looking for a special bottle for a gift or occasion. Our dedicated staff are always happy to help you with the perfect choice.
.entry-content
#post-147

Events
.entry-header
Host Your Next Event With Us
For packages, more information, and pricing, contact us at:
winelovers@napleswinebar.com
. We will cater to your needs!
Naples Society Wine Bar can host all types of events:
• Bachelorette Parties
• Birthday Parties
• Anniversary Parties
• Bridal & Baby Showers
• Group Meetings
• Charity & Other Non-Profit Fundraisers
• Private Wine Tasting for Friends
• Charity Events
• Business / Corporate Functions
Our Weekly Events
We’re your local destination for all things wine
